originalText.text: I have been a client of Henry for several years and I have only seen incredible work leave his salon. I‚Äôm not sure where these bad reviews are coming from but they can not be true. He truly is the King of color & hair extensions. I travel over 2 hours in each direction to see him for my blonde. Every woman I see leave his chair looks absolutely stunning. From color, extensions to makeup ‚Ä¶nothing  but beautiful ! He truly is amazing‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Henry is the best doing hair extensions. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. You do have to wait since he‚Äôs busy but it‚Äôs worth the wait. He also uses great products. Thank you for doing my wife‚Äôs hair so lovely. She gets compliments for her hair all the time.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve gone to so many different hair salon and this one I love so much!! Great service, clean, great products and Henry does an amazing job with my hair extensions. Not only does my hair last me, my hair doesn‚Äôt fall off once I get them removed and my hair is really thin. So Thank you! üôè

originalText.text: I LOVE this salon. They are the only people I trust with my hair because they are experts. I truly love coming here because everything is 100000000% immaculate. They have given me the best hair I‚Äôve ever had in my entire life. Therefore, my life has transformed in every area. Before I came across this salon, my hair was my biggest flaw and they have transformed me into making it one of my biggest assets. People from all ages and walks of life always compliment my hair. The blowouts last and I wake up feeling flawless. House of Dolls will literally turn you into A DOLL! Come here. The service here is unmatchable. The place is also absolutely luxurious and flawless. They treat you like a princess and always make sure you are well taken care of. They treat you with the highest class and levels of care. Everything here is of the highest quality and I trust these people even with eyes closed. They do a superb job and also know what is in style and what looks good. I have found my forever salon. I have been a happy customer since December 2021. House of Dolls is my peaceful retreat as the place is excellent and it‚Äôs also a relaxing environment. All of the workers are sweethearts and deliver the highest level of service. Also, as a Latina, it used to be hard for me in the past to find a luxurious, impeccable, high-quality salon that understands my hair and I have found it- it is House of Dolls by Henry. They understand my hair and all hair types. Come here to leave as a total DOLL. You will not regret it.  ‚ô•Ô∏è

originalText.text:
"My experience at the House of Dolls over the past 10 years has been truly exceptional. Henry excels in every aspect of his craft, whether it's coloring or extensions. His extensive knowledge in the field is evident, and if you ever have any uncertainties about what to do with your hair, he is undoubtedly the go-to expert.

What sets this establishment apart is not just Henry's talent but also his humble spirit, which creates a comfortable and serene atmosphere during every visit. The same can be said for his entire staff, including Samantha, Luis, Yahaira, Bri, and Yolanda. They are all remarkable, and their dedication to top-notch customer service is evident.

I wholeheartedly recommend the House of Dolls to anyone seeking a high-end, top-tier haircare experience." With a feeling of family.
